name: parcel-react-ssr
description: Example of SSR with React and ParcelJS
author: Benoit Tremblay <benoit@reactivestack.com>

scripts.build: rimraf dist && npm run build-imported && npm run build-client && npm run build-server && npm run build-server-stream
scripts.build-client: cross-env BABEL_ENV=client parcel build app/index.html -d dist/client --public-url /dist --no-minify --no-cache
scripts.build-server: cross-env BABEL_ENV=server parcel build server/index.js -d dist/server --public-url /dist --target=node --no-minify  --no-cache
scripts.build-server-stream: cross-env BABEL_ENV=server parcel build stream-server/index.js -d dist/server-stream --public-url /dist --target=node --no-minify  --no-cache
